languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, юный Эвейн Винтерскейл просит передать свою благодарность за ваше гостеприимство и спасение его от верной гибели. Не желая докучать вам, оставаясь в гостях дольше приличного, он планирует сойти на Футфоле. Эвейн клянется, что не забудет свой долг перед вами".

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, young Evayne Winterscale has asked me to convey his gratitude for your hospitality and for saving him from certain death. Not wishing to outstay his welcome, he plans to disembark at Footfall. Lord Evayne swears he will not forget his debt to you."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, юный Эвейн Винтерскейл просит передать свою благодарность за ваше гостеприимство и спасение его от верной гибели. Не желая докучать вам, оставаясь в гостях дольше приличного, он планирует сойти на Футфоле. Эвейн клянется, что не забудет свой долг перед вами".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, young Evayne Winterscale has asked me to convey his gratitude for your hospitality and for saving him from certain death. Not wishing to outstay his welcome, he plans to disembark at Footfall. Lord Evayne swears he will not forget his debt to you."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, young Evayne Winterscale has asked me to convey his gratitude for your hospitality and for saving him from certain death. Not wishing to outstay his welcome, he plans to disembark at Footfall. Lord Evayne swears he will not forget his debt to you."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, young Evayne Winterscale has asked me to convey his gratitude for your hospitality and for saving him from certain death. Not wishing to outstay his welcome, he plans to disembark at Footfall. Lord Evayne swears he will not forget his debt to you."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, young Evayne Winterscale has asked me to convey his gratitude for your hospitality and for saving him from certain death. Not wishing to outstay his welcome, he plans to disembark at Footfall. Lord Evayne swears he will not forget his debt to you."

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, der junge Evayne Winterzunder lässt seine Dankbarkeit für Eure Gastfreundschaft und die Rettung vor dem sicheren Tode übermitteln. Er will Eure Gunst nicht überbeanspruchen und darum in Footfall von Bord gehen. Lord Evayne schwört, dass er seine Schuld Euch gegenüber nicht vergessen wird."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, young Evayne Winterscale has asked me to convey his gratitude for your hospitality and for saving him from certain death. Not wishing to outstay his welcome, he plans to disembark at Footfall. Lord Evayne swears he will not forget his debt to you."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, der junge Evayne Winterzunder lässt seine Dankbarkeit für Eure Gastfreundschaft und die Rettung vor dem sicheren Tode übermitteln. Er will Eure Gunst nicht überbeanspruchen und darum in Footfall von Bord gehen. Lord Evayne schwört, dass er seine Schuld Euch gegenüber nicht vergessen wird."

languages.text: “大人，年轻的艾维尼·温特斯凯尔让我帮忙转达他的感激之情。他非常感激您救了他一命，感激您的热情款待。他打算在落脚港下船，不再继续叨扰。艾维尼勋爵发誓，说他绝不会忘记欠您的人情。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, young Evayne Winterscale has asked me to convey his gratitude for your hospitality and for saving him from certain death. Not wishing to outstay his welcome, he plans to disembark at Footfall. Lord Evayne swears he will not forget his debt to you."

traits.locale_text: “大人，年轻的艾维尼·温特斯凯尔让我帮忙转达他的感激之情。他非常感激您救了他一命，感激您的热情款待。他打算在落脚港下船，不再继续叨扰。艾维尼勋爵发誓，说他绝不会忘记欠您的人情。”

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, le jeune Evayne Winterscale m'a demandé de vous transmettre ses remerciements pour votre accueil et pour l'avoir sauvé d'une mort certaine. Comme il ne voudrait pas abuser de votre hospitalité, il compte débarquer à Castel, mais il m'a juré qu'il n'oublierait jamais qu'il a une dette envers vous. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, young Evayne Winterscale has asked me to convey his gratitude for your hospitality and for saving him from certain death. Not wishing to outstay his welcome, he plans to disembark at Footfall. Lord Evayne swears he will not forget his debt to you."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, le jeune Evayne Winterscale m'a demandé de vous transmettre ses remerciements pour votre accueil et pour l'avoir sauvé d'une mort certaine. Comme il ne voudrait pas abuser de votre hospitalité, il compte débarquer à Castel, mais il m'a juré qu'il n'oublierait jamais qu'il a une dette envers vous. »

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, el joven Evayne Winterscale me ha pedido que le transmita su agradecimiento por la hospitalidad que le ha brindado y por salvarlo de una muerte segura. No quiere suponer una carga, por lo que desembarcará. Lord Evayne jura que no olvidará la deuda que ha contraído con usted».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, young Evayne Winterscale has asked me to convey his gratitude for your hospitality and for saving him from certain death. Not wishing to outstay his welcome, he plans to disembark at Footfall. Lord Evayne swears he will not forget his debt to you."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, el joven Evayne Winterscale me ha pedido que le transmita su agradecimiento por la hospitalidad que le ha brindado y por salvarlo de una muerte segura. No quiere suponer una carga, por lo que desembarcará. Lord Evayne jura que no olvidará la deuda que ha contraído con usted».

languages.text: 「陛下、若きエヴァイン・ウィンタースケールが、陛下のおもてなしと、自身を死から救っていただいたことへの感謝を伝えたいと申しております。彼の歓待に長い時間を費やしたくはないため、フットフォールで下船の予定です。エヴァイン卿は、陛下への恩義を忘れないと誓っております」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, young Evayne Winterscale has asked me to convey his gratitude for your hospitality and for saving him from certain death. Not wishing to outstay his welcome, he plans to disembark at Footfall. Lord Evayne swears he will not forget his debt to you."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、若きエヴァイン・ウィンタースケールが、陛下のおもてなしと、自身を死から救っていただいたことへの感謝を伝えたいと申しております。彼の歓待に長い時間を費やしたくはないため、フットフォールで下船の予定です。エヴァイン卿は、陛下への恩義を忘れないと誓っております」

languages.text: "Genç Evayne Winterscale, konukseverliğiniz ve kendisini mutlak bir ölümden kurtardığınız için minnettarlığını iletmemi rica etti {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Size daha fazla rahatsızlık vermemek adına Binliman'da gemiden ayrılmayı planlıyormuş. Ayrıca size olan borcunu unutmayacağına yemin ediyor."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, young Evayne Winterscale has asked me to convey his gratitude for your hospitality and for saving him from certain death. Not wishing to outstay his welcome, he plans to disembark at Footfall. Lord Evayne swears he will not forget his debt to you."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, genç Evayne Winterscale, konukseverliğiniz ve onu mutlak ölümden kurtardığınız için size minnettarlığını iletmemi rica etti. Gereğinden fazla rahatsızlık vermemek adına Binliman'da gemiden ayrılmayı planlıyor. Lord Evayne size olan bu borcunu unutmayacağına yemin ediyor."
